remarks: Division of two ratios.  Theorem I.15 of [Apostol] p. 18.  (Contributed by NM, 22-Feb-1995.)
statement:
divclz.1 $e |- A e. CC $.
divclz.2 $e |- B e. CC $.
divmulz.3 $e |- C e. CC $.
divmuldiv.4 $e |- D e. CC $.
divmuldiv.5 $e |- B =/= 0 $.
divmuldiv.6 $e |- D =/= 0 $.
divdivdiv.7 $e |- C =/= 0 $.
divdivdivi $p |- ( ( A / B ) / ( C / D ) ) = ( ( A x. D ) / ( B x. C ) ) $.
